skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.externalLink: Click to see my Webflow Portfolio

portfolio.title: Lister
portfolio.description: Simplifying task management in a calendar by offering preset categories like Today, Next 7 Days, and All Days. Users can also create custom Projects to further organize their tasks.

portfolio.title: BookMark
portfolio.description: BookMark was developed to provide a visually-oriented solution for managing URL links. Users have the ability to log in, categorize their URLs, and store them within their personal resource catalog for easy access and organization.

portfolio.title: BookIt
portfolio.description: Quickly gain consensus for meetups, whether with family, colleagues, or classmates. Create an event, customize it, distribute invitation links, and conveniently monitor RSVPs.
